filter.mintauthtooltip: The token can’t be minted anymore — no one can create new tokens.
filter.freezeauthtooltip: No one can freeze token transfers.
filter.lpburnedtooltip: Liquidity Pool tokens were burned — this helps lock the liquidity in place.

ordersetting.sllippagetooltip: The maximum % you're willing to tolerate between the expected and actual execution price. If the price moves more than this before the trade is confirmed, it will fail.
ordersetting.priorityfeetooltip: A tip paid to validators/miners to prioritize your transaction. Higher fees make your transaction process faster during times of network congestion.
ordersetting.mevtooltip: Protection against front-running and sandwich attacks by hiding your transaction details from public mempools, typically by routing through private relays or block builders.

tableheaders.liquiditytooltip: Shows how much money is available to trade this token. Low liquidity can mean high risk or hard to sell.
tableheaders.mcaptooltip: Market Cap: Estimated total value of this token: price × supply. High market cap = more established.
tableheaders.swapstooltip: How many times people bought (green) or sold (red) this token in the selected time frame
tableheaders.auditrestooltip: Quick safety checks: shows if token can be minted again, frozen, or if token has 10 Holders.

tableheaders.beforetooltip: Shows time since token was called
tableheaders.calledmctooltip: Shows time since token was called
tableheaders.athtooltip: All time high of the token
tableheaders.audittooltip: Quick safety checks: shows if token can be minted again, frozen, or if token has 10 Holders.

tableheaders.newcreationstooltip: Tokens that were just launched and are still extremely new. These might be experimental, highly volatile, or unverified. Enter at your own risk — DYOR (do your own research)!
tableheaders.abouttogratooltip: Tokens gaining traction and engagement, showing signs of growth. They're not fully established yet, but they're moving toward higher recognition or adoption.
tableheaders.graduatedtooltip: Tokens that have achieved a certain level of credibility or performance. They’ve passed initial phases and show stronger price action, volume, or community activity.

tableheaders.pnlusdtooltip: Your Profit or Loss from this token, shown in US dollars. Green = you’re up, Red = you’re down.
tableheaders.pnlpertooltip: Percentage change in the value of your holdings since purchase.
tableheaders.quickselltooltip: Instantly sell your entire position in t,his token with one click.

holdings.noconnectwallet: Please login to see your holdings.
holdings.noholdingsmsg: You currently do not have any token holdings in your Wave trading wallet.

pageData.title: Unlock More Referral Tier with Wave Referral Program!
pageData.desc: Friends you refer get early access to Wave with a 10% Fee Discount

table.tradestool: The amount this referrer has traded in USD.
table.earningtool: The amount you can claim from this user's referral.
table.statustool: Indicates whether you're eligible to claim your referral bonus.

mainHeader.title: Alpha Picks
mainHeader.desc: Find the best traders and copy their strategies

siderightbar.bestcallstooltip: Displays the highest-gaining calls during the selected interval and the Alpha group who made them.
siderightbar.recentalphastooltip: Shows the most recently joined Alpha groups in Wave Scan.
siderightbar.risingstartooltip: Alpha groups that are quickly gaining momentum, either through a recent surge in popularity or a sharp increase in their performance score.

mainHeader.title: Wallet Tracker
mainHeader.desc: Tag, track, and analyze multiple wallets

tableHeaders.valuetooltip: Value of Token sold or bought in USD

importwallets.desc: Please enter the wallet addresses for wave pro import

balance.totalvaluetool: The current total market value of all assets held in the wallet. This includes both realized and unrealized gains/losses.
balance.unrealizedpnltool: Profit or loss from assets that are still being held and not yet sold. These values fluctuate with market prices and are not finalized.
balance.avabalancetool: The amount of capital currently not locked in positions and available for new trades or withdrawals.

performance.totalpnltool: The overall profit or loss from all transactions, including both realized and unrealized values. A negative number indicates a net loss.
performance.totaltxtool: The combined value of all transactions processed by the wallet, showing total volume across buys and sells.

left.gainerstool: Wallets that have achieved the highest profits (PnL) over a specified time period based on their trading performance.

right.loserstool: Wallets that have incurred the most significant losses (PnL) over a specified time period from their trading activity.

quickbuy.slippagedesc: How much less tokens you're willing to receive from a trade due to price volatility.
quickbuy.maxgasdesc: The maximum amount of gas you are willing to offer for ANY transaction. We highly recommend that you refrain from adjusting this setting.
quickbuy.priorityfeedesc: Extra 'tip' to have your transaction completed faster. The higher the priority fee, the higher the chance of getting your transaction processed sooner.
quickbuy.mevprotectiondesc: Enable this for protection against sandwich attacks from MEV bots and save on gas fees in the event of a failed transaction.
quickbuy.briberyamountdesc: Set an additional bribe amount on top of your priority fee for the block builder to place your transaction as soon as possible.
quickbuy.customizedesc: Customize your Quick Buy buttons with your own preset amounts.

quicksell.mevprotectiondesc: Enable this for protection against sandwich attacks from MEV bots and save on gas fees in the event of a failed transaction.
quicksell.briberyamountdesc: Set an additional bribe amount on top of your priority fee for the block builder to place your transaction as soon as possible.
quicksell.customizedesc: Customize your Quick Buy buttons with your own preset amounts.

notifications.wallettrackingtool: View wallet tracker alerts you've received.
notifications.alphapickstool: View past Alpha calls from groups you're following.

left.last7dpnLtool: The total profit or loss (in % and USD) generated by the wallet over the past 7 days from all trading activities.
left.liquiditytool: The total value of tokens currently provided as liquidity in DeFi pools by the wallet.

middle.pnltool: Summary of your trading performance including profits, costs, and balance metrics.
middle.unrealizedprofitstool: Estimated gains or losses from tokens still held, based on their current market price and acquisition cost.
middle.7dcosttool: The total amount spent on buying tokens in the past 7 days.
middle.7davgcosttool: The average purchase price of tokens acquired within the last 7 days.
middle.7drealizedprofitstool: The average profit or loss made per token that was sold in the past 7 days.

right.distributiontool: Breakdown of positions by profit/loss percentages. Helps visualize how many holdings fall into profit/loss ranges.

recentPnL.token/lastactivetool: The specific token held and the last time it was actively traded or interacted with by the wallet.
recentPnL.unrealizedtool: Current profit or loss from tokens that are still held and not yet sold.
recentPnL.30drealizedprofittool: Net profit or loss from tokens sold in the past 30 days. Realized means the position was closed.
recentPnL.totalprofittool: Net profit or loss from tokens sold in the past 30 days. Realized means the position was closed.
recentPnL.positiontool: The percentage of the wallet’s total portfolio value allocated to a specific token.
recentPnL.30dtxtool: The number of times this token was bought or sold in the past 30 days.

holdings.token/lastactivetool: The specific token held and the last time it was actively traded or interacted with by the wallet.
holdings.unrealizedtool: Current profit or loss from tokens that are still held and not yet sold.
holdings.30drealizedprofittool: Net profit or loss from tokens sold in the past 30 days. Realized means the position was closed.
holdings.totalprofittool: Net profit or loss from tokens sold in the past 30 days. Realized means the position was closed.
holdings.positiontool: The percentage of the wallet’s total portfolio value allocated to a specific token.
holdings.30dtxtool: The number of times this token was bought or sold in the past 30 days.

profile.noData: No buying or selling in the last 30 days

stats.txtool: Total number of buy or sell actions that occurred.
stats.makerstool: Unique wallets/users who initiated buys (not sells), often meaning first-time buyers or liquidity participants.

tokeninfo.liqtool: Total value locked in the token's trading pool.
tokeninfo.fdvtool: Fully Diluted Valuation Market cap if all tokens were in circulation. FDV = Price x Total Supply
tokeninfo.mctool: Market cap based on current circulating tokens (same as FDV if all tokens are unlocked).

datasecurity.minttool: Controls whether new tokens can be minted. Disabled = No more tokens can be created (good for trust).
datasecurity.freezetool: Ability to freeze or restrict token transfers. Disabled = Transfers cannot be frozen (safer for holders).
datasecurity.lptool: Shows whether the liquidity tokens were burned. 100% Burned = Dev can’t rug-pull liquidity.
datasecurity.top10tool: Number of wallets in the top 10 that hold this token. Can indicate centralization risk if just a few holders own most of the supply.
datasecurity.pooled1: Amount of this token in the trading pool, and its USD value.
datasecurity.pooled2: Amount of SOL paired with the token in the liquidity pool, and its total value.

tableHeaders.qtytool: Quantity of the main token being traded.
tableHeaders.sideqtytool: Amount of the opposite token used in the trade. For Sell: This is how much SOL was received. For Buy: This is how much SOL was spent.
tableHeaders.sidecurrencytool: The paired currency in the transaction.
tableHeaders.pricetool: Effective price per unit for the main token in side currency.
tableHeaders.valuestool: Total USD value of the transaction based on the side currency.
tableHeaders.pooltool: The liquidity pool or market where the trade happened. Shortened wallet address of the pool's creator or owner.

tableHeaders.dextool: The decentralized exchange or platform where the token was launched or traded
tableHeaders.investtool: The total amount of funds this wallet has spent on launching or buying tokens. This reflects their upfront investment.
tableHeaders.soldtool: The total value this wallet has made by selling tokens. High values mean strong exit or realized profit.
tableHeaders.volumetool: Combined total of buys and sells across this wallet’s tokens. Useful for seeing wallet activity or traction.
tableHeaders.exptool: View this wallet on Solscan, the Solana blockchain explorer.

recovery.thisPrivateKey: This private key will allow you to access your wallet if you ever lose your credential to your moon pro account
recovery.warning: WARNING: This recovery key is the only way to access your wallet if you lose your credentials. Store it in a safe place and do not share it with anyone.
recovery.warningPrivate: WARNING: This private key is the only way to access your wallet if you lose your credentials. Store it in a safe place and do not share it with anyone.

security.DONOTSHARE: Access your seed phrase to export your accounts. DO NOT SHARE!
security.walletAccounts: Add or manage your external wallet accounts
